key_risks: High debt levels with a debt-to-equity ratio of 2.87
Customer concentration risk with heavy reliance on key customers like Apple
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to dependence on third-party suppliers
controversies: Anti-Asian bias lawsuit alleging a culture of prejudice against Asians

Securities lawsuit against Oclaro regarding insufficient disclosure to shareholders

governance_issues: Securities lawsuit raising concerns about corporate governance and transparency

sources.title: BIS, DOJ Investigating Telecom Supplier for Violating Export Controls ...
sources.snippet: Lumentum submitted a voluntary self-disclosure to BIS after an "internal review" last year revealed that it may have shipped export-controlled items to Huawei without a license, Lumentum said in an SEC filing Friday. The company said it received a subpoena from BIS in August that asked for its Huawei-related business records, and it received a similar subpoena from DOJ soon after.
